subheading: TrustWorthy is a free, client-side interface helping you interact with the Ethereum blockchain. Our easy-to-use, open-source platform allows you to generate wallets, interact with smart contracts, and so much more.

create-wallet.title: Create a new wallet
create-wallet.subtitle-one: Please select a method to create a new wallet

card-one.title: Get TrustWorthy wallet app
card-one.subtitle: Download our official app and connect to TrustWorthy web using your mobile phone. Available on iOS and Android.

card-two.title: Buy a Hardware Wallet
card-two.subtitle: For the highest standard of security, buy a hardware wallet and use it with TrustWorthy.

card-three.title: Software
card-three.subtitle: Software methods like keystore file and mnemonic phrase should only be used in offline settings by experienced users.

access-my-wallet.title: Access My Wallet
access-my-wallet.subtitle-one: Please select a method to access your wallet.

features.heading: Your Gateway to the Ethereum Blockchain

eth.title: Buy, send and receive ETH and ERC20 tokens.

swap.heading: Swap with TrustWorthy
swap.title: Swap fiat to ETH, ETH to BTC, and ETH to ERC20 tokens via integrated partners 1inch, DEX AG, Changelly, Bity, and Simplexs.

dapps.text: TrustWorthy team is working hard to update the DApps Center. Cantâ€™s wait?
dapps.link-text: Access all DApps in TrustWorthy Version 5

tokens.heading: TrustWorthy supports ETH and all ERC-20 tokens!

about-TrustWorthy.heading: Easy and secure access to the Ethereum Blockchain

card-one.title: Friendly to use
card-one.text: Access the Ethereum blockchain's original and most-trusted wallet, now with a host of new features all contained in an elegant and friendly interface.

card-two.title: Swaps, DeFi, DApps, NFTs, Stablecoins
card-two.text: Partnered with Bity, Kyber Network, Changelly, and Simplex to allow users to swap fiat to crypto, ETH and BTC, ETH and ERC-20.

card-three.title: Hardware wallet support
card-three.text: TrustWorthy offers support for all major hardware wallets including Ledger, Trezor, and many more.

card-four.title: TrustWorthy wallet
card-four.text: TrustWorthy brings a hardware wallet style security to your iOS or Android smart phone, helping you to secure your funds as never before.

TrustWorthytopia-block.title: New to crypto? Explore TrustWorthytopia!
TrustWorthytopia-block.text: Learn how to get the most out of Ethereum with our free library of resources!

TrustWorthy-wallet-modal.title: Get the official TrustWorthy wallet app
TrustWorthy-wallet-modal.text: Buy, hold, and send Ether and tokens. Explore Ethereum on your mobile device. {learn-more}
